mapper.select: SELECT distinct(a.apiTypeId) id,b.name FROM qyfinance.bkvwApi a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType b ON a.apiTypeId=b.id
SELECT vendorId,balance FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiVendorBalance WHERE vendorId=#{param}
mapper.update: UPDATE qyfinance.ApiVendorBalance SET balance=#{param2} WHERE vendorId=#{param1}
mapper.select:
SELECT ee.vendorId,ee.vendorName, ee.weekTotleCost, ee.monthTotleCost, (ifnull(ee.consumeTotleAmount,0)+ifnull(ee.currDayCost,0)) consumeTotleAmount, ee.currMonthCost, ee.currDayCost, ff.balance,gg.partnerId,gg.partnerName,gg.status apiVendorStatus, hh.apiTypeId, hh.apiTypeName, hh.mobileOperatorName, hh.status apiStatus, hh.apiTypeConsumeTotleAmount, hh.apiTypeUsageAmount, hh.cost FROM ( SELECT aa.vendorId,aa.vendorName, sum(bb.weekTotleCost) weekTotleCost, sum(cc.monthTotleCost) monthTotleCost, sum(dd.consumeTotleAmount) consumeTotleAmount, sum(currMonth.currMonthCost) currMonthCost, sum(currDay.currDayCost) currDayCost FROM qyfinance.bkvwApi aa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT apiId,totleCost weekTotleCost FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiWeekMonthAmount WHERE typeId=1 AND tableId=3 AND years=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 1 week),'%x') AND weeks=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 1 week),'%v') ) bb ON aa.id=bb.apiId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y') years,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%m') months,sum(cost) currMonthCost,apiId FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiRequestLog WHERE ok=1 AND isMock=0 AND DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 0 month),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m'),apiId ) currMonth ON aa.id=currMonth.apiId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y') years,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%m') months,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%d') days,sum(cost) currDayCost,apiId FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiRequestLog WHERE ok=1 AND isMock=0 AND DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 0 day),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d'),apiId ) currDay ON aa.id=currDay.apiId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT apiId,totleCost monthTotleCost FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiWeekMonthAmount WHERE typeId=2 AND tableId=3 AND years=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 1 month),'%Y') AND months=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 1 month),'%m') ) cc ON aa.id=cc.apiId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT apiId,sum(totleCost) consumeTotleAmount FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiCostDayCount
AND consuTime>=str_to_date(#{beginDate},'%Y/%m/%d')
AND consuTime<=str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y/%m/%d')
GROUP BY apiId ) dd ON aa.id=dd.apiId GROUP BY aa.vendorId,aa.vendorName ) ee LEFT JOIN ( SELECT eee.vendorId,eee.vendorName,eee.consumeTotleAmount,ifnull((fff.balance-eee.consumeTotleAmount),-eee.consumeTotleAmount) balance FROM ( SELECT aaa.vendorId,aaa.vendorName,sum(ddd.consumeTotleAmount) consumeTotleAmount FROM qyfinance.bkvwApi aaa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sum(cost) consumeTotleAmount,apiId FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiRequestLog WHERE ok=1 AND isMock=0 GROUP BY apiId ) ddd ON aaa.id=ddd.apiId GROUP BY aaa.vendorId,aaa.vendorName ) eee LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiVendorBalance fff ON eee.vendorId=fff.vendorId ) ff ON ee.vendorId=ff.vendorId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiVendor gg ON ee.vendorId=gg.vendorId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aa.apiTypeId,aa.apiTypeName,aa.vendorId,aa.cost,aa.mobileOperatorName,aa.status, (ifnull(bb.consumeTotleAmount,0)+ifnull(cc.typeCurrDayCost,0)) apiTypeConsumeTotleAmount, (ifnull(bb.usageAmount,0)+ifnull(cc.typeCurrDayUsageAmount,0)) apiTypeUsageAmount FROM qyfinance.bkvw_api_ApiTypeVendorPartner aa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT apiId,sum(totleCost) consumeTotleAmount,sum(usageAmount) usageAmount FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiCostDayCount
AND consuTime>=str_to_date(#{beginDate},'%Y/%m/%d')
AND consuTime<=str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y/%m/%d')
GROUP BY apiId ) bb ON aa.apiId=bb.apiId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sum(cost) typeCurrDayCost,count(id) typeCurrDayUsageAmount,apiId FROM qyfinance.bkvwApiRequestLog WHERE ok=1 AND isMock=0 AND DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(sysdate(),interval 0 day),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d'),apiId ) cc ON aa.apiId=cc.apiId ) hh ON ee.vendorId=hh.vendorId
gg.status in
#{status}
AND ee.vendorId=#{vendorId}
AND gg.partnerId=#{partnerId}
ORDER BY hh.apiTypeName ASC,hh.status DESC
